objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Horror lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about family and relationships using expert register
Students create original horror themed content about family and relationships in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Horror story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using expert register in horror context
Character B: Responding in expert register within horror theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
